issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://www.google.com/search?q=798y](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.google.com%2Fsearch%3Fq%3D798y) ### Comment > This problem occurs randomly when searching for some words on Google search. > > Same Issue - This is on PC > https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/157063#issuecomment-1650921962 > > Related issue - This is on iPhone > https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/157063#issuecomment-1646561877 > > Also, it can only be reproduced when you are not logged into your Google account. > The content of the popup is this. > "Access a variety of Google services with a single login. Log in./Keeps you logged out." > It cannot always be reproduced by searching for the same word. Therefore, I don't think you can reproduce it by accessing the URL of the issue.The only way to reproduce it is to repeat the word search until the popup re-appears. > I have uploaded the html file for you to utilize.Thank you in advance! > https://upvid.cc/IbZ5Sd4bz6/798y_Google_2023_7_29_10_36_04_html ### Screenshots

comment.body:
Regarding - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/156776#issuecomment-1657934232
>Open the new bing window in the edge browser, the page will become confusing

It's caused by `Web Annoyances Ultralist` filter list, so please disable it or add this rule:
```adblock
bing.com#@$##b_tq_header, .header, .sbox { position: absolute !important; }
```
to user rules.
Related - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/156776#issuecomment-1641721911

AdGuard DNS

AdGuard Public Plain DNS (Default servers)

Missed ads or ad leftovers, Missed analytics or tracker

Firefox, Chrome, other (specify in comment below), the problem is with app, not a site

Desktop

Many websites and apps

AdGuard DNS filter

_No response_
